name: companies_profile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool financial_modeling_prep.
Tool description: Extensive Financial Data API covering more than 70,000 Stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds and indexes! Real-time & Historical Data
API description: This API returns companies profile (Price,Beta,Volume Average, Market Capitalisation, Last Dividend, 52 week range, stock price change, stock price change in percentage, Company Name, Exchange, Description, Industry,Sector,CEO,Website and image).

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company.

apikey.description: API key for the Financial Modeling Prep API.
